content.question: The graph of the function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 4 is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 7" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> consists of three line segments and two semicircles, as shown in the figure above. What is the value of <math alttext="the integral from, negative 4 to 7, of, f of x, d x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="6 minus, the fraction 3 pi over 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="10 minus, the fraction 3 pi over 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="6 plus, the fraction 5 pi over 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="10 plus, the fraction 5 pi over 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="10 minus, the fraction 3 pi over 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
